text:
Created attachment 4236
test WAR and source codes which cause the problem
creator: takehiko.yokota@toshiba.co.jp
remm@apache.org
text:
Jasper does not flush the writer anymore after processing the page (which is
valid, servlets are not forced to do it), so the data still is in its buffer.
Since you code "owns" the writer, you'll have to flush or close it yourself.
